title: What is the best laptop under 1 lakh which can compete with MacBook Pro in every way but runs on Windows? - Quora

response.answer_text: Me myself , a really big fan of Apple and a fan of MacBooks , I would not say that a Windows PC would match the standards of a MacBook , but there is one which matches the conditions you have mentioned above . It is ……  The Dell XPS 13 inch No matter how much Windows sucks , the PCs with it are appreciated somehow . It’s base price is is somewhere around 94k and it comes with a Intel i5 processor and 8GB RAM . And it is one of the most powerful PCs ever made. It is also lightweight , it weighs 1.23 Kilograms . There are also lot of good laptops out there , but this one is one of the best and it also kinda matches the power and standards of MacBook Pro .
It's difficult to get, if you want to compete it with a macbook pro. Though you can have a look on Acer's Predetor series
